subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: When Madalitso Muthiya stands on the first tee at 9:01 a.m. Thursday at the United States Open, Zambia will rejoice and a father's dream will have been realized at one of golf's most revered tournaments.
snippet: When Madalitso Muthiya stands on the first tee at 9:01 a.m. Thursday at the United States Open, Zambia will rejoice and a father's dream will have been realized at one of golf's most revered tournaments.
